contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 22, 1885 D Barnsley Contest
Barnsley Contest 0 Other Barnsley Contest [1800s] barnsley-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Beechfield, Barnsley Prizes: £20, £12 10s, £7 10s, £2. March: 1. Honley, 2. Old Silkstone. Besses o th Barn disqualified for arriving late. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 17, 2013, 4:23 p.m. July 2, 2018, 1:40 p.m.
1 Honley Silver Band Fenton Renshaw Weber Fantasia [arr. Gladney]
2 Old Silkstone Coniah Stringer Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
3 Lindley Band Edwin Swift Meyerbeer's Works [unknown arranger]
4 Rockingham Band Joseph Boothroyd Reminiscences of Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
Disqualified Besses o' th' Barn Unknown
